name: Muckety Mudskipper: Missing Link
description:
Meet Muckety Mudskipper!

She's half land lover, half sea dweller and all missing link!

Join Muckety on her quest for the lost DNA strands!

Natch, she's opposed by evil insects who want to keep terra

firma all to themselves, and wicked fish who are jealous of

her advanced evolutionary state!

But she's not defensless, she can swallow mud balls and spit them back

out at her enemies!

Run, leap, swim your way through countless levels of action, adventure

and highly evolved entertainment!
